extract_schema_params(config_info: dict) → dict | None¶

Extracts the required schema parameters from the config info dict in order to build the schema to validate against.

In this instance, there are no parameters.

Parameters:

config_info -- a dict containing the config info from the user.

Returns:

a dict (might be None) containing all the required parameters

to build the schema.

transform_schema(config_info: dict) → dict¶

Transforms the config info passed in by the user to construct the config information required by the model builder.

Parameters:

config_info -- dict containing the config information

Returns:

(dict) -- the transformed config info
